title: #278: Atum Syncretism Synchronizing with Santos Bonacci and Eddie Bravo
description:
Thank you for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome back TFH OG, Eddie Bravo, and the Universal Truth Scholar, Santos Bonacci, to discuss how it's all Atum Syncretism Synchronizing and how we live one of the 7 Realms! Thank you so much for your support.

Please check out :
Santos Bonacci's live presentation of "All Is Atum" in Los Angeles this Sunday night!

https://www.eventbrite.com/e/all-is-atum-syncretism-lecture-connecting-all-fields-by-santos-bonacci-tickets-91414668735

AND they give away 1 free suit every week to one of our listeners. thats just tinfoil hat fans. we announce the winner here the following week on the show. Just go to ADsuits.com/TinFoilHat and put in your email. or don't put in your email in for the free suit and just go to ADsuits.com/TinFoilHat and get a 2-button suit for $39
